desc: Students pursue guided fieldwork experience in the United States. Activities and readings in this course build on the topics from ASIAN 210 and three semesters of language study. Students reflect on the experience of Asians in America through readings, site visits, and local interviews. Students develop projects and follow a process of inquiry that will help them understand how ordinary people construct "Asian" culture and society today. Prerequisite: ASIAN 210. Offered during Interim.
name: AsianCon2:Asia in America
title: Asian Conversations II: Encountering Asia in America
